CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 29, 1958, pg. B27 reads: "All Together, Now! - The members of the Ivy Club, sponsored by the Iota Chapter of Alpha Kappa Alpha, show their interest in music as they gather around the piano. Seated, left to right, are Frances Ruffin and Marva Jones.  Standing are Sarah Plowden, Edna Hill and Lois Jean Dougan.  Not in the picture are Shirley Mike and Joan Clark. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Ivy Club members, from left, seated: Frances Ruffin and Marva Jones; standing: Sarah Plowden, Edna Hill, and Lois Jean Dougan, gathered around upright piano in interior with s wirl patterned carpeting and geometric patterned curtains
